question: Countries should restrict foreign companies from opening offices and factories in order to protect local businesses. Do you agree or disagree?
text: In this Neoteric era, a plethora of people assures that international company’s workplace and factory ought to be mitigated to enhance of domestic one. On the other hand, others bolster that this methodology does not impact the ambiance substantially. Moreover, this essay will depict my disapprobation regarding the former idea.

First of all, job vacancies will be sporadic. There is ample evidence to suggest that the number of workers outweigh the number of domestic companies. Furthermore, It is undeniable that nowadays, finding a feasible occupation is quite adverse. Thus, by giving a chance to oversea companies to aggrandize, it will be beneficial for societies. It provides the labourers to have a decent job and high income concomitantly. Thus, it is clear that terminating the non-local businesses will anguish the worker.

Secondly, this regulation is a double-edged sword. In other words, the diversity of marketing proficiency will be mitigated. There is ample evidence to suggest that a considerable number of domestic companies joint venture with foreign one. It is prevalent that these locals harness the techniques of the non-local organisation. Henceforth, by incrementing the newcomers to establish a workplace in the local market, it will jeopardize the skills of local labourers, because they cannot interact with foreign people that have distinct mindset.

To recapitulate, while numerous of people espouse that non-domestic firms should be diminished to nourish the local one. However, there are some key factors that cannot be neglected if the union inhibit the establishment of oversea corporations such as shortage in the job vacancy.
